```{r}
library(lterdatasampler)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

#pie_crab
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = pie_crab, aes( x = size, y = latitude)) +
  geom_point() +
  labs(caption = "this is my caption" )
```


```{r}
pie_crab |>
  group_by(site) |>
  summarize(mean = round(mean(size),2),
             sd = sd(size),
            count = n())
  
```
